item.title: Unicon Announces ''Sakai v2.1 Test Drive'' Open Source Learning Environment for Educators
item.description: Colleges and Universities Can Experience the Latest Sakai Tools -- Risk Free PHOENIX--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Dec. 15, 2005--Unicon, Inc., the leading independent provider of enterprise portal, collaboration, learning, and integration technology for higher education institutions, today announced a new, hosted "Sakai Test Drive" program done...

item.title: Michigan, Indiana, MIT, Stanford Contribute Sakai Software to the Sakai Foundation, Sakai 2.1 ...
item.description:
PRESS RELEASE Austin, Texas, USA -- 6 December 2005 -- Michigan, Indiana, MIT, and Stanford Contribute Sakai Software to the Sakai Foundation, Sakai 2.1 Released to the Public, 500+ Gather in Austin for 7-9 December Conference
mmiles@umich.edu...

item.title: We Want Posters!
item.description: powerpoint template (/austin/sakai_poster_template.ppt) for you to use. Create your poster using this template (http://www.sakaiproject.org/austin/sakai_poster_template.ppt), print it out and bring it to the conference. We'll hang these posters all over the conference area throughout the conference.

item.title: Sakai 2.1.0 released
item.description: The Sakai 2.1.0 release is now available. This release adds the ability to manage sub-sections within course sites, and it has redesigned several of the Sakai tools to take advantage of such sections. This sectioning facility represents the first stage of employing...

item.title: Charles Sturt University commits to the Sakai Foundation
item.description: Thursday 1st December 2005-- Charles Sturt University, Australia’s largest distance education provider and a pioneer in online delivery today announced that it will join some of the world’s leading universities in committing to the support of the community source Sakai Foundation and in...

item.title: Sakai Conference begins December 6th - Latest News and Updates
item.description:
Updated -- List of Technical Demonstrations (http://www.sakaiproject.org/index.php?option=com_content task=blogcategory id=162 Itemid=499) planned for Thursday, December 8th
Have you already registered? Then add your photo to the Sakai Austin Facebook (https://sakaiproject.org/austin/facebook). Share your photo and interests and get to know other...

item.title: First Sakai Foundation Board Elections Results
item.description: The first Sakai Foundation Board elections have completed. This is another significant step in the development of the Sakai community and its Foundation. As many said, the field of nominees was so strong that it was hard to choose among them....

item.title: Sakai Foundation Board elections have begun, results are expected to be announced in early December
item.description: Three new Sakai board members will be elected by the organizational representatives as specified in the Sakai Foundation bylaws. A current list of organizational representatives has been posted here (http://sakaiproject.org/index.php?option=com_content task=view id=104 Itemid=203#reps) . The Sakai community can view...
